thread.title: Linedata Capitalstream Named Risk Management Award Finalist
thread.title_full: Linedata Capitalstream Named Risk Management Award Finalist

title: Linedata Capitalstream Named Risk Management Award Finalist
text:
Linedata Capitalstream Named Risk Management Award Finalist September 04, 2015, 07:00 AM Related: Linedata , Linedata Capitalstream 
Linedata announced that Linedata Capitalstream has been shortlisted for a CIR Risk Management Award. Celebrating their 6th year, the Risk Management awards have experienced the highest number of entries on record, making it an even greater achievement to be shortlisted this year.Linedata is a globally recognized leader in the lending and leasing industry assisting financial institutions with the development of their business worldwide. With over 450 professionals focused on lending and leasing, Linedata serves more than 130 institutions in 35 countries. Most Popular
